paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on BRCA2 variants, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Germline mutations were detected in the patients but not in the control subject.

functional_data.summary: Identified as a pathogenic variant associated with hereditary breast/ovarian cancer.

variants.additional_notes: This variant was confirmed by Sanger sequencing.
key_quotes: To detect the BRCA2 complex variant c.7921_7926delGAATTTinsAG (p.Glu2641Argfs) the generation of 'complex variant candidates parameter' in the Torrent Suite Software has been activated.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data extracted from the main text.
